utilities

Class Normal

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Normal

  • public class Normal
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility attempts to generate set of iDim Double values with a variance of dVariance and a mean of 0.0. It achieves these goals asymptotically, as iDim goes towards infinity
    Author:
    ralph

      • C_Vector

        private java.lang.Double[] C_Vector(int l,
                                    java.lang.Double vc)
        Generates a set of 'l' randomly distributed Double values with a nominal standard distribution of 'vc'. The method returns an array of 'l' double values with a mean of 0.0 for each 'Effect'.
        Parameters:
        l - number of states for Effect
        vc - variance component for Effect
        Returns:
        Double array (dim l) of Gaussian pseudo random numbers, mean 0.0, variance vc.

      • generateGaussian

        public static double generateGaussian(double mean,
                                      double stdDev)
        Marsaglia polar method Marsaglia, G.; Bray, T. A. (1964). "A Convenient Method for generating Normal Variables". SIAM Review. 6 (3): 260â€“264
        Parameters:
        mean - required mean value
        stdDev - standard deviation parameter
        Returns:
        Double random value
